name: Hopping Mad
Lore: '''I''m standing here in pieces and you''re having delusions of grandeur!''',
Text: 'Deploy on one of your droids. During your control phase, may use 1 Force to search your Reserve Deck, take one Droid Shutdown, The Professor, We''re Doomed, Scomp Link Access, This Is All Your Fault or Shocking Information into hand and reshuffle.',
